ocremixupdater
Class OCReMix

java.lang.Object
  ocremixupdater.OCReMix
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class OCReMix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

Represents a single OC ReMix, including its number, file name, whether the user has it on disk or not, and whether the user wants to download it or not.

Also contains all the static methods for converting ReMix names.

public static final java.lang.String[][] REPLACEMENTS

toRow

public java.lang.Object[] toRow()
Make an array of four objects that represents this ReMix.

Returns:
The elements are: (Integer)number, (Boolean)have, (Boolean)get, and name.

createFullName

public static java.lang.String createFullName(java.lang.String game,
                                              java.lang.String title)
Guess the ReMix filename based on the game name and the ReMix title.

Parameters:
game - The game's name. E.g.: "Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest" [sic]
title - The ReMix title in plain text. E.g.: "Intense Glory (victory mix)"
Returns:
The ReMix filename. E.g.: "Portal_Not_Alive_Anymore_OC_ReMix.mp3"

replaceAllLiteral

public static java.lang.String replaceAllLiteral(java.lang.String searchIn,
                                                 java.lang.String searchFor,
                                                 java.lang.String replaceWith)
Perform literal replacement of one String for another in a given String.

Parameters:
searchIn - The String to replace things in.
searchFor - The String to find.
replaceWith - The String to replace searchFor with.
Returns:
The resultant String.

reduceName

public static java.lang.String reduceName(java.lang.String name)
Squash up the given filename as much as possible, to see if a file with a name that also squashes to this already exists.

Parameters:
name - The file name.
Returns:
The "reduced" file name.

fiveDigitNumber

public static java.lang.String fiveDigitNumber(int number)
Convert an OCR number to its five-digit-number String.

Parameters:
number - The ReMix number.
Returns:
A String padded on the left with zeros to five digits.
